snippet: The fashion designer Pierre Cardin has a dream of turning a Venice industrial dump into a futuristic palazzo, leading to a debate about the city’s future.
abstract: Venice Journal; fashion designer Pierre Cardin's dream of building towering palazzo, housing apartments, hotels and fashion university, in dilapidated industrial neighborhood in Venice has stirred debate about city's future and alarmed conservationists, who fear way in which project will affect neighboring lagoon.
lead_paragraph: The fashion designer Pierre Cardin has a dream of turning a Venice industrial dump into a futuristic palazzo, leading to a debate about the city’s future.

headline.seo: Pierre Cardin’s Futuristic Vision for Venice
headline.main: Futuristic Vision for a City Rooted in the Past
headline.print_headline: Futuristic Vision for a City Rooted in the Past
